question_text: Which two statements accurately describe a private cloud? (Select two)
answer_options: It is also called an external cloud
It is hosted within the organization’s own data center
It shares hardware with other customers
It provides full control over infrastructure and security
correct_answer: It is hosted within the organization’s own data center
It provides full control over infrastructure and security
explanation: Private (internal) clouds are fully owned and operated by a single organization and not shared.
